text: He will say, ´Enter the Fire together with the nations of jinn and men who have passed away before you.´ Each time a nation enters, it will curse its sister nation, until, when they are all gathered together in it, the last of them will say to the first, ´Our Lord, those are the ones who misguided us, so give them a double punishment in the Fire.´ He will say, ´Each will receive double. But you do not know it.´
